en.av_c1: To apply Domino effect solving technique, it is assumed that there is a sequence of integers, from 1 to N, hidden behind the dominos, and the only way to see the integer behind a domino is tipping its front domino over
en.av_c2: Since the first domino has to be tipped over manually, the solution for the base case, PrintOneToN(1), is solved nonrecursively by printing 1.
en.av_c3: For any other domino, before a domino is tipped over all of its preceded dominos have to be tipped over and then the current domino will be tipped over subsequently.
